markdownRemark.html: Located between the fishing port and the mouth of the Real River. The beach is 400 meters long and about 40 meters wide. This beach itself has many different facilities including WC´s, showers and sun loungers for hire. This is a popular beach for locals and can be quite busy during summers.

frontmatter.title: El Cable Beach in Motril
frontmatter.description: El Cable Beach, in Motril  - Located between the fishing port and the mouth of the Real River. The beach is 400 meters long and about 40 meters wide. This beach itself has many different facilities including WC´s, showers and sun loungers  for hire. This is a popular beach for locals and can be quite busy during summers.
frontmatter.address: Rambla de las Brujas, 21, 18613 Motril, Granada
